about_the_game:
Dig and explore the depth of the earth ; Mine and harvest miscellaneous resources ; Craft better tools and weapons and expand your base ! Fight against local mobs. Unlock electricity to lighten the darker depths. Automate harvesting to reign on the underground world.

Caracteristiques
  • Indie Game
  • Sandbox
  • Procedural Generation
  • Farm / Craft / Build / Fight

For demo purposes, out of the 7 biomes, only the first 3 are available.
